Enum Action

public enum Action extends Enum<Action>
Representation of actions an agent can take.

      public static Action valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the enum constant to be returned.
      Returns:
      the enum constant with the specified name
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if this enum type has no constant with the specified name
      NullPointerException - if the argument is null

    • convertCharToAction

      public static Action convertCharToAction(char chr) throws InvalidActionException
      Convert a character into an Action enum.
      Parameters:
      chr - Character to be converted into an Action
      Returns:
      Action corresponding to the input character
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - Character has no translation into an Action

      public static Action nextSwipe(Action action) throws InvalidActionException
      Return the next action around the clock.
      Parameters:
      action - Current action
      Returns:
      Next action with respect to input
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - Movement action not specified
